title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1220.5 - Compliance with mediation agreement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1220.5 - Compliance with mediation agreement

State Regulations

Compliance with the terms of the mediation
agreement shall result in dismissal of the complaint by the disciplinary
office. An attorney's failure to comply with the terms of the mediated
agreement shall constitute "conduct prejudicial to the administration of
justice" and shall result in the complaint being investigated as a disciplinary
matter under the appropriate Appellate Division rules. A complainant's failure
to comply with the terms of the mediated agreement shall result in the
dismissal of the complaint. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1220.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
